statements: DELETE FROM crop_health_data WHERE drone_id = 1 AND capture_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM crop_health_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM crop_health_data WHERE drone_id = 1 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_status = 'Poor' AND health_score >= 0.5;

DELETE FROM drone_capture WHERE drone_id = 10 AND capture_time < '2022-01-01';
